name: Endless Rocks, Endless Nights 2.0
description:
--NOTE-- 

FULL SCREEN RECOMENDED!!


--ABOUT--

Endless Rocks, Endless Nights, is a survival game where you mine stone to craft structures and upgrade your pickaxe, each night is harder then the last until it is eternal night time, death, and suffering...    How long can YOU survive??

Everything, excluding music , which was made by CasperKae, was made by me.

--WHAT'S NEW--

-Balancing

-2 new pick tiers

-Upgradable buildings

-Mines

-More bandit skins

-Some new sound affects.

-Bigger map

-Revamped UI

-Shows day reached upon death

-Upgrade UI

-Character customization

-Removed enemy projectiles

-New tutorial
